sentences.cn: 近期将出版书籍的目录

sentences.en: Both tracks are remixed versions of tracks from her forthcoming album.
sentences.cn: 两首曲目都是她即将推出的专辑歌曲的混音版本。

sentences.en: He discusses the forthcoming engagement with several other soldiers, particularly Jim Conklin.
sentences.cn: 他同其他士兵, 特别是吉姆?康克林,讨论即将来临的战斗.

sentences.en: He discusses the forthcoming engagement with several other soldiers, particulayly Jim Conklin.
sentences.cn: 他同其他士兵, 特别是吉姆·康克林,讨论即将来临的战斗.

sentences.en: He gave me a list of their forthcoming books.
sentences.cn: 他给了我一张他们即将出版图书的目录.

sentences.en: He was exhilarated by the thought of his forthcoming trip.
sentences.cn: 他想到即将到来的旅行,就兴高采烈.

sentences.en: Her letter may purport her forthcoming arrival.
sentences.cn: 她的来信可能意味着她快要到了.

sentences.en: His telegragram may purport his forthcoming arrival.
sentences.cn: 他的电报可能意味着他快要到达了.

sentences.en: I'm going to consult with my publisher about my forthcoming book.
sentences.cn: 我将就我即将问世的作品与出版商交换意见.

sentences.en: Keep an eye on the noticeboards for forthcoming events .
sentences.cn: 请注意布告牌上的活动预告。

sentences.en: On the strength of my forthcoming salary increase, I have decided to buy a better car.
sentences.cn: 由于我的工资即将增加, 我已决定买一辆好一些的汽车.

sentences.en: The outcome of our actions, on the contrary, is quite forthcoming.
sentences.cn: 与此相反, 我们的实际行动却是相当乐以助人的.

sentences.en: The secretary at the reception desk was not very forthcoming.
sentences.cn: 接待处的秘书不太主动.

sentences.en: They talked about the school and a forthcoming swim meet.
sentences.cn: 他们谈了学校的情况和即将举行的一次游泳比赛.

trans.tran_cn: 即将到来的，现成的，唾手可得的，乐于助人的
trans.tran_en: a forthcoming event, meeting etc is one that has been planned to happen soon
